DEFAULT_ERRORS.AUTHENTICATION_FAILED: Please login to access this resource.
DEFAULT_ERRORS.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Internal server error. Please try again later.
DEFAULT_ERRORS.LOGIN_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password and try again.
DEFAULT_ERRORS.VALIDATION_FAILED: Validation failed. Please modify the request and try again.

VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_TILT_ANGLE: Tilt angle must be provided and it must be in range [0, 90]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_AZIMUTH_ANGLE: Azimuth angle must be provided and it must be in range [0, 360]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_RATIO_AC_TO_DC: AC to DC ratio must be provided and it must be a positive number
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_INVERTER_EFFICIENCY: Inverter efficiency must be provided and it must be in range [90, 99.5]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_RATIO_GROUND_COVERAGE: Ground coverage ratio must be provided and it must be in range [0, 3]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_LOSS: Loss in percentage must be provided and it must be in range [0, 100]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_MODULE_TYPE: Module type must be provided and it can only contain values [0, 1, 2]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_ENABLE_BATTERY: Enable battery flag can only contain values [0, 1]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_ARRAY_TYPE: Array typr must be provided and it can only contain values [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_TIME_STEP_SELL_RATES: Step sell rates must be provided and it can only contain values [0, 1]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_CONSTANT_LOSS_ADJUSTMENT: Constant loss adjustment must be provided and it must be in range [0, 100]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_LATITUDE: Latitude must be provided ('lat'), and it must range bw -90 to 90
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_LONGITUDE: Longitude must be provided ('lon'), and it must range bw -180 to 180
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_BATTERY_CHEMISTRY: Battery chemistry flag must be provided and can only contain values [0, 1]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_BATTERY_CAPACITY: Battery capacity must be provided and it must be a positive number
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_BATTERY_POWER: Battery power must be provided and it must be a positive number
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_BATTERY_DISPATCH: Battery dispatch flag must be provided and can only contain values [0, 1, 4]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_CHARGE_FROM_PV: Charge from PV matrix must be provided if battery is enabled and manual dispatch is chosen
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_CHARGE_FROM_GRID: Charge from grid matrix must be provided if battery is enabled and manual dispatch is chosen
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_DISCHARGE: Discharge matrix must be provided if battery is enabled and manual dispatch is chosen
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_CHARGE_FROM_GRID_PERCENT: Charge from grid percent matrix must be provided if battery is enabled and manual dispatch is chosen
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_DISCHARGE_PERCENT: Discharge matrix must be provided if battery is enabled and manual dispatch is chosen
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_MANUAL_DISPATCH_WEEKDAY: Manual dispatch weekday matrix must be provided if battery is enabled and manual dispatch is chosen
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_MANUAL_DISPATCH_WEEKEND: Manual dispatch weekend matrix must be provided if battery is enabled and manual dispatch is chosen
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_DC_ARRAY_POWER: DC array power must be provided and it must be an array
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_HOURLY_ENERGY: Hourly energy must be provided and it must be an array
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_INVERTER_MODEL: Inverter model must be provided and can only contain values [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]
VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_ELECTRICAL_LOAD: Electric load matrix must be provided
